# frames

**Instance Property**

An array of weights in which each element represents a discrete state of the target entity at a given point in the animation’s timeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var frames: [BlendShapeWeights] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This array contains sequential values for the animated property when [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationDefinition/bindTarget] is an array of weights.
title: frames
